name: PXTutorial
summary: PXTutorial provides a configurable JSON file and programmatic interface to define the steps of a tutorial.
description: PXTutorial provides a configurable JSON file and programmatic interface to define the steps of a tutorial. Each step contains image, headline and text, additionally it can contain a link and a close button. The link can be used to open an external web link. The close button can be used to redirect users to the next view.
